node.html: Benjamin Effiong, the visionary Founder and CEO of Forkhive, possesses extensive expertise as a Senior Frontend Software Engineer specializing in React-TS and JavaScript. His profound understanding of the tech industry and its operational dynamics drives Forkhive's success
Daniel is a medical professional passionate about integrating AI concepts into healthcare.

frontmatter.title: Daniel Effiong
frontmatter.subtitle: Medical Advisor for AI Medical Team

node.html: Leslie is a tech enthusiast specializing in MERN Stack development.
Leslie is a tech enthusiast specializing in MERN Stack development.
Leslie is a tech enthusiast specializing in MERN Stack development.
Micheal is an accomplished Senior Fullstack Software Engineer adept in MERN and GraphQL technologies.
Patrick is an adept Senior Backend Software Engineer skilled in Node-TS and JavaScript.

node.data: {"Home":"Gida","View All Services":"Dubawa Duk Manhajiyar Hutu.","Get In Touch":"Samun Tuntuɓi","Innovating African businesses":"Ƙirƙirar kasuwancin Afirka","We are a Software Development Company, primarily focused on Frontend Web Development.":"Mu Kamfanin Haɓaka Software ne, wanda aka fi mai da hankali kan Ci gaban Yanar Gizo na Frontend.","Building Bridges between Technology and Human Experience":"Gina Gada tsakanin Fasaha da Kwarewar Dan Adam","We are a dynamic Software Development Company with a primary emphasis on Frontend Development.":"Mu Kamfanin Haɓaka Software ne mai ƙarfi tare da babban fifiko kan Ci gaban Frontend.","Our passion for innovation drives us to explore and expand into cutting-edge fields such as Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, and Machine Learning.":"Mu sha'awar ƙirƙira yana motsa mu don bincika da faɗaɗa cikin manyan fannoni kamar Kimiyyar Bayanai, Hankali na Artificial, da Koyan Injin.","Empower Your Digital Journey":"Ƙarfafa Tafiya ta Dijital","Crafting digital excellence is our focus. Elevate your online presence with tailored Frontend solutions, ensuring a captivating user experience.":"Ƙirƙirar ƙwararrun dijital shine abin da muke mai da hankali. ","Phone 1":"Waya 1","Phone 2":"Waya 2","Email":"Imel","Contact":"Tuntuɓar","About":"Game da","Pricing":"Farashi","Team":"Tawaga","Services":"Ayyuka","Who we are":"Me ya sa mu","Pricing built for businesses of all sizes":"An gina farashin don kasuwanci na kowane girma","Our team of Engineers":"Tawagar Injiniyoyinmu","ABOUT":"GAME DA","PRICING":"PRICING","TEAM":"KUNGIYAR","Our Services":"Ayyukanmu","Artificial Intelligence":"Sirrin Artificial","Data Science":"Kimiyyar Bayanai","Machine Learning":"Koyon Injin","Mobile Development":"Ci gaban Wayar hannu","Web Design/Development":"Tsarin Yanar Gizo / Ci gaba","Our AI team specializes in crafting algorithms and harnessing existing ones to optimize human efficiency in both business and household…":"Ƙungiyarmu ta AI ta ƙware wajen ƙirƙira algorithms da amfani da abubuwan da ke akwai don haɓaka haɓakar ɗan adam a cikin kasuwanci da gida…","At Team ML, our primary focus revolves around harnessing AI algorithms to empower systems with the capability to autonomously learn and…":"A Team ML, babban abin da muka fi mayar da hankali ya ta'allaka ne game da amfani da algorithms AI don ƙarfafa tsarin tare da ikon koyo da kansa…","We specialize in crafting top-notch websites and web apps that are not only of high quality but also exceptionally responsive and user…":"Mun ƙware wajen kera manyan gidajen yanar gizo da ƙa'idodin gidan yanar gizo waɗanda ba kawai masu inganci ba amma har ma na musamman da amsawa da mai amfani…","In mobile development, we harness the power of React Native, a versatile Mobile App Development Framework. This framework empowers us to…":"A cikin ci gaban wayar hannu, muna amfani da ikon React Native, Tsarin Ci gaban App na Wayar hannu…","Our team of skilled engineers delves deep into the world of data, exploring methods to effectively record, store, and analyze information…":"Ƙwararrun ƙwararrun injiniyoyinmu sun zurfafa cikin duniyar bayanai, suna bincika hanyoyin da za a iya yin rikodin yadda ya kamata, adanawa, da kuma nazarin bayanai…","At Team ML, our primary focus revolves around harnessing AI algorithms to empower systems with the capability to autonomously learn and improve from experience without explicit programming. Additionally, we are dedicated to developing computer programs that can access data and autonomously enhance their learning capabilities.":"A Team ML, babban abin da muka fi mayar da hankali ya ta'allaka ne akan amfani da algorithms AI don ƙarfafa tsarin tare da ikon koyo da haɓakawa daga ƙwarewa ba tare da fayyace shirye-shirye ba. ","We specialize in crafting top-notch websites and web apps that are not only of high quality but also exceptionally responsive and user-friendly. Our secret sauce lies in leveraging cutting-edge mobile technologies, such as TypeScript, React Native, MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, and Node), Gatsby, and Vite. These technologies are at the forefront of the industry, ensuring that your digital presence aligns seamlessly with the latest trends in upcoming industries.":"Mun ƙware wajen kera manyan gidajen yanar gizo da ƙa'idodin gidan yanar gizo waɗanda ba kawai masu inganci ba ne amma kuma na musamman na amsawa da abokantaka. ","In mobile development, we harness the power of React Native, a versatile Mobile App Development Framework. This framework empowers us to create multi-platform Android and iOS apps with native UI elements, ensuring a seamless and high-quality user experience across different devices.":"A cikin ci gaban wayar hannu, muna amfani da ikon React Native, Tsarin Ci gaban App na Wayar hannu. ","Our team of skilled engineers delves deep into the world of data, exploring methods to effectively record, store, and analyze information. Our ultimate objective is to derive valuable insights and knowledge from a diverse range of data, be it structured or unstructured.":"Ƙwararrun ƙwararrun injiniyoyinmu suna zurfafa zurfafa cikin duniyar bayanai, suna binciko hanyoyin yin rikodin yadda ya kamata, adanawa, da tantance bayanai. ","Our AI Team focuses on writing algorithms and leveraging on existing one to maximise human efficiency in business and home at large":"Teamungiyarmu ta AI tana mai da hankali kan rubuta algorithms da yin amfani da na yanzu don haɓaka haɓakar ɗan adam a cikin kasuwanci da gida gabaɗaya","Our team of engineers deeply explore data and ways to record, store and analyze data to extract useful information and our end goal is to…":"Teamungiyar injiniyoyinmu suna zurfafa bincika bayanai da hanyoyin yin rikodi, adanawa da tantance bayanai don fitar da bayanai masu amfani kuma ƙarshen burinmu shine…","Our team of engineers deeply explore data and ways to record, store and analyze data to extract useful information and our end goal is to gain insights and knowledge from any type of data both structured and unstructured":"Teamungiyar injiniyoyinmu suna zurfafa bincika bayanai da hanyoyin yin rikodi, adanawa da bincika bayanai don fitar da bayanai masu amfani kuma ƙarshen burinmu shine samun fahimta da ilimi daga kowane nau'in bayanan da aka tsara da kuma waɗanda ba a tsara su ba.","For mobile development we utilise (React Native) which is a Mobile App Development Framework that enables the development of multi-platform…":"Don ci gaban wayar hannu muna amfani da (React Native) wanda shine Tsarin Ci gaban App na Wayar hannu wanda ke ba da damar haɓaka dandamali da yawa…","For mobile development we utilise (React Native) which is a Mobile App Development Framework that enables the development of multi-platform Android and iOS apps using native UI elements":"Don ci gaban wayar hannu muna amfani da (React Native) wanda shine Tsarin Ci gaban App na Wayar hannu wanda ke ba da damar haɓaka aikace-aikacen Android da iOS masu yawa ta amfani da abubuwan UI na asali.","Here at Team ML we focus on making use of AI algorithms by providing sytems the ability to automatically learn and in improve from…":"Anan a Team ML mun mai da hankali kan yin amfani da algorithms AI ta hanyar samar da tsarin ikon koyo ta atomatik da haɓakawa daga…","Here at Team ML we focus on making use of AI algorithms by providing sytems the ability to automatically learn and in improve from experience without being explicitly programmed, we also focus on the development of computer programs that can access data and use it to learn for themselves":"Anan a Team ML muna mai da hankali kan yin amfani da algorithms AI ta hanyar samar da tsarin ikon koyo ta atomatik da haɓakawa daga gogewa ba tare da tsara shirye-shirye ba, muna kuma mai da hankali kan haɓaka shirye-shiryen kwamfuta waɗanda za su iya samun damar bayanai da amfani da su don koyan kansu.","We create websites and web apps of high quality that are highly responsive and user friendly using one of the best and fastest mobile…":"Muna ƙirƙira gidajen yanar gizo da ƙa'idodin yanar gizo masu inganci waɗanda ke da saurin amsawa da abokantaka ta amfani da ɗayan mafi kyawun wayar hannu mafi sauri…","We create websites and web apps of high quality that are highly responsive and user friendly using one of the best and fastest mobile technologies, React Native MERN stack(MongoDB, Express, React and Node), Gatsby and Vite which is utilised in most upcoming industries":"Muna ƙirƙirar gidajen yanar gizo da ƙa'idodin yanar gizo masu inganci waɗanda ke da saurin amsawa da abokantakar mai amfani ta amfani da ɗayan mafi kyawun fasahar wayar hannu, React Native MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React da Node), Gatsby da Vite waɗanda ake amfani da su a yawancin masana'antu masu zuwa.","Your vision is built with":"An gina hangen nesa da ku","GATSBY":"GATSBY","Gatsby.js, a popular open-source framework for building modern web applications. Gatsby.js is based on React and uses GraphQL to pull data from various sources to generate static websites":"Gatsby.js, sanannen tsarin buɗaɗɗen tushe don gina aikace-aikacen gidan yanar gizo na zamani. ","NEST":"NEST","NestJS is a framework for building scalable and efficient server-side applications. It is often used to develop web applications, APIs, and microservices using TypeScript or JavaScript. NestJS is built with a modular and extensible architecture and draws inspiration from Angular, which makes it familiar to developers who have experience with Angular":"NestJS wani tsari ne don gina ƙaƙƙarfan aikace-aikacen gefen uwar garke. ","VITE":"VITE","Vite is a build tool and development server that is designed to optimize the development experience for modern web applications, particularly those using frameworks like React, Vue, and others. Vite is known for its fast startup time and efficient development workflow.":"Vite kayan aikin gini ne da uwar garken ci gaba wanda aka tsara don haɓaka ƙwarewar haɓaka don aikace-aikacen yanar gizo na zamani, musamman waɗanda ke amfani da tsarin kamar React, Vue, da sauransu. ","REACT":"MATSAYI","React, also known as React.js or ReactJS, is an open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components. It was developed by Facebook and is widely used for creating interactive and dynamic user interfaces in web applications. React allows developers to build reusable UI components, making it easier to manage and update complex user interfaces.":"React, wanda kuma aka sani da React.js ko ReactJS, babban ɗakin karatu ne na JavaScript don gina mu'amalar mai amfani ko abubuwan UI. ","REACT NATIVE":"AMSA DAN UWA","React Native is an open-source framework developed by Facebook that allows developers to build mobile applications using JavaScript and React. With React Native, you can create cross-platform mobile apps that run on both iOS and Android platforms while sharing a significant portion of the codebase. This enables developers to use their web development skills to build native mobile applications.":"React Native wani tsarin buɗaɗɗen tushe ne wanda Facebook ya haɓaka wanda ke ba masu haɓaka damar gina aikace-aikacen hannu ta amfani da JavaScript da React. ","JAVASCRIPT":"JAVASCRIPT","JavaScript is a high-level, versatile, and interpreted programming language primarily known for its role in web development. It is commonly used to add interactivity, dynamic content, and behavior to websites. JavaScript is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS.":"JavaScript babban mataki ne, mai jujjuyawar harshe, da fassarar yaren shirye-shirye da aka fi sani da rawar da yake takawa wajen ci gaban yanar gizo. ","HTML 5":"HTML 5","HTML5, the fifth and latest version of the Hypertext Markup Language, is a standard markup language for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web. HTML5 was officially released as a W3C Recommendation in October 2014, and it brings several new features and improvements over its predecessor, HTML4.":"HTML5, sigar ta biyar kuma ta ƙarshe ta Harshen Haɗaɗɗen Haɗaɗɗen Haɗaɗɗiya, daidaitaccen harshe ne mai ƙima don tsarawa da gabatar da abun ciki akan Yanar gizo ta Duniya. ","CSS 3":"CSS 3","CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a style sheet language used for describing the look and formatting of a document written in HTML or XML. CSS3 is the latest version of CSS, bringing new features, enhancements, and capabilities to the language. CSS3 builds upon the foundation of CSS2 and introduces several advanced styling options and techniques. ":"CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) wani salon zane ne da ake amfani da shi don kwatanta kamanni da tsara takaddun da aka rubuta cikin HTML ko XML.  ","GRAPHQL":"GRAPHQL","GraphQL is a query language and runtime for APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) that was developed by Facebook. It provides a more efficient, powerful, and flexible alternative to traditional REST APIs. GraphQL allows clients to request only the data they need and receive a predictable, structured response, making it well-suited for building modern web and mobile applications":"GraphQL harshe ne na tambaya da lokacin aiki don APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) wanda Facebook ya haɓaka. ","SASS":"SASS","Sass, which stands for Syntactically Awesome Stylesheets, is a preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). SassScript is the scripting language itself. It provides mechanisms such as variables, nested rules, and mixins, making CSS more maintainable and easier to write.":"Sass, wanda ke tsaye ga Syntactically Awesome Stylesheets, harshe ne na rubutun da aka riga aka yi wanda aka fassara ko aka haɗa shi cikin Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). ","R":"R","R is a programming language and free software environment specifically designed for statistical computing and graphics. It is widely used by statisticians, data scientists, researchers, and analysts for tasks such as data analysis, statistical modeling, visualization, and machine learning. R provides a comprehensive set of tools for working with data, and it has a large and active community that contributes to its packages and ecosystem.":"R harshe ne na shirye-shirye da muhallin software na kyauta wanda aka tsara musamman don ƙididdigar ƙididdiga da zane-zane. ","PYTHON":"PYTHON","Python is a high-level, versatile, and interpreted programming language known for its readability and ease of use. It supports multiple programming paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming. Python has become one of the most popular programming languages, used in various domains such as web development, data science, artificial intelligence, scientific computing, automation, and more.":"Python babban matakin harshe ne, mai juzu'i, kuma fassarar shirye-shirye wanda aka sani don iya karantawa da sauƙin amfani. ","MONGO DB":"MONGO DB","MongoDB is a cross-platform, document-oriented NoSQL (Not Only SQL) database program. It falls under the category of NoSQL databases because it does not use the traditional relational database management system (RDBMS) structure. Instead, MongoDB stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents known as BSON (Binary JSON) that can vary in structure, allowing for a dynamic and scalable approach to data storage.":"MongoDB tsari ne na giciye, shirin bayanai na NoSQL (Ba kawai SQL ba) mai daftarin aiki. ","NODE JS":"NODE JS","Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment that allows developers to execute server-side JavaScript code. It is built on the V8 JavaScript runtime engine, which is the same engine that powers the Google Chrome browser. Node.js enables the development of scalable and high-performance web applications by using an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model.":"Node.js buɗaɗɗen tushe ne, mahalli na lokaci-lokaci na JavaScript na dandamali wanda ke ba masu haɓaka damar aiwatar da lambar JavaScript ta gefen uwar garken. ","ANGULAR":"ANGULAR","Angular is a popular open-source web application framework developed and maintained by Google. It is written in TypeScript and allows developers to build dynamic, single-page web applications (SPAs) with a focus on creating a modular and maintainable codebase. Angular provides a comprehensive set of features for building modern, client-side web applications.":"Angular sanannen tsarin aikace-aikacen gidan yanar gizo ne na buɗaɗɗen tushe wanda Google ya haɓaka kuma yana kiyaye shi. ","NPM":"NPM","NPM stands for Node Package Manager, and it is the default package manager for Node.js, a JavaScript runtime environment. NPM is used to manage and distribute packages (libraries and tools) written in JavaScript and intended for use with Node.js.":"NPM tana nufin Manajan Fakitin Node, kuma shine tsoho mai sarrafa fakiti na Node.js, yanayin lokacin aiki na JavaScript. ","GITHUB":"GITHUB","GitHub is a web-based platform that provides a centralized repository hosting service for version control using Git. It is widely used by developers and teams to collaboratively work on software projects, track changes, and manage code repositories. GitHub offers a range of features to support collaboration, code review, issue tracking, and continuous integration.":"GitHub dandamali ne na tushen gidan yanar gizo wanda ke ba da sabis na tallan tallace-tallace na tsakiya don sarrafa sigar ta amfani da Git. ","FIGMA":"FIGMA","Figma is a cloud-based design and prototyping tool that enables collaborative interface design and user experience (UI/UX) prototyping. It is commonly used by designers, developers, and teams to create, share, and iterate on designs in real-time. Figma's key feature is its cloud-based platform, which allows multiple users to collaborate on design projects simultaneously, fostering a seamless and efficient design process.":"Figma shine ƙirar tushen girgije da kayan aikin samfuri wanda ke ba da damar ƙirar haɗin gwiwar haɗin gwiwa da ƙwarewar mai amfani (UI/UX). ","ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR":"ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR","Adobe Illustrator is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Adobe Inc. It is part of the Adobe Creative Cloud suite of design software, which also includes applications like Photoshop, InDesign, and Premiere Pro. Illustrator is widely used by graphic designers, illustrators, and artists to create scalable vector graphics for print and digital media.":"Adobe Illustrator shine editan zane-zane na vector wanda Adobe Inc ya haɓaka kuma ya tallata shi. Yana daga cikin Adobe Creative Cloud suite na ƙirar software, wanda kuma ya haɗa da aikace-aikace kamar Photoshop, InDesign, da Premiere Pro. ","ADOBE PHOTOSHOP":"ADOBE PHOTOSHOP","Adobe Photoshop is a powerful raster graphics editor developed and published by Adobe Inc. It is widely used by designers, photographers, and artists for image editing, retouching, digital painting, and graphic design. Photoshop is a part of the Adobe Creative Cloud suite and is known for its extensive range of features and capabilities.":"Adobe Photoshop babban editan zanen raster ne wanda Adobe Inc ya haɓaka kuma ya buga shi. Masu zanen kaya, masu ɗaukar hoto, da masu fasaha suna amfani da shi sosai don gyaran hoto, sake gyarawa, zanen dijital, da ƙirar hoto. ","LINUX":"LINUX","Linux is an open-source, Unix-like operating system kernel that serves as the foundation for a variety of free and open-source operating systems. It was created by Linus Torvalds in 1991 as a hobby project, and it quickly became a popular choice for operating systems due to its stability, security, and flexibility. Linux is known for its use in servers, embedded systems, and as an alternative operating system for personal computers.":"Linux buɗaɗɗen tushe ne, kernel mai kama da Unix wanda ke aiki a matsayin tushe don nau'ikan tsarin aiki na kyauta da buɗewa. ","SUBLIME IDE":"SUBLIME IDE","'Sublime Text is a sophisticated and widely used text editor, not an Integrated Development Environment (IDE). It is known for its speed, simplicity, and extensive plugin ecosystem. While Sublime Text provides many features commonly associated with IDEs, it lacks certain integrated tools specific to particular programming languages.":"'Maɗaukakin Rubutu nagartaccen editan rubutu ne da ake amfani da shi sosai, ba Integrated Development Environment (IDE). ","NETLIFY":"NETLIFY","Netlify is a cloud platform that provides a range of services for building, deploying, and managing modern web projects. It is particularly known for its simplicity, automation, and integration with popular static site generators and modern web development workflows. Netlify supports both static and serverless (function-as-a-service) architectures, making it a popular choice for web developers and teams.":"Netlify dandamali ne na girgije wanda ke ba da sabis da yawa don gini, turawa, da sarrafa ayyukan gidan yanar gizo na zamani. ","TABLEAU":"TABLEAU","Tableau is a powerful data visualization and business intelligence (BI) platform that enables users to connect to, visualize, and share insights from their data. It allows individuals and organizations to create interactive and dynamic dashboards, reports, and visualizations to gain valuable insights into their data.":"Tableau wani dandamali ne mai ƙarfi na hangen nesa da bayanan kasuwanci (BI) wanda ke bawa masu amfani damar haɗawa, gani, da raba bayanai daga bayanansu. ","VS CODE":"VS CODE","Visual Studio Code (VS Code) is a free and open-source source code editor developed by Microsoft. It is lightweight, highly customizable, and supports a wide range of programming languages and extensions. VS Code is designed to provide developers with a productive environment for coding, debugging, and version control, making it one of the most popular code editors in the developer community.":"Kayayyakin Kayayyakin Kayayyakin Kayayyakin Kayayyakin (VS Code) kyauta ne kuma buɗaɗɗen tushe editan lambar tushe wanda Microsoft ya haɓaka. ","RAPID MINER":"MAGANIN MA'ASAR RAPID","RapidMiner is a data science platform that provides an integrated environment for end-to-end data science and machine learning processes. It allows users to perform tasks such as data preparation, machine learning modeling, and deployment of predictive models. RapidMiner is designed to be user-friendly, making it accessible to a wide range of users, including data scientists, analysts, and business professionals.":"RapidMiner dandamali ne na kimiyyar bayanai wanda ke ba da haɗe-haɗen yanayi don ƙarshen-zuwa-ƙarshen kimiyyar bayanai da hanyoyin koyon injin. ","We are dedicated to keeping our clients' websites in optimal condition through regular maintenance.<br /><br />Our commitment extends to staying in constant communication with our clients to address any updates, improvements, or concerns, ensuring their online presence remains seamless and effective.":"An sadaukar da mu don kiyaye gidajen yanar gizon abokan cinikinmu a cikin mafi kyawun yanayi ta hanyar kulawa akai-akai.<br /><br />Alƙawarinmu ya ƙaddamar da kasancewa cikin sadarwa ta yau da kullun tare da abokan cinikinmu don magance duk wani sabuntawa, haɓakawa, ko damuwa, tabbatar da kasancewar su ta kan layi ya kasance mara kyau da inganci.","At the forefront of innovation, we specialize in designing and developing cutting-edge solutions using the latest technologies. Our dedicated team of experts ensures a seamless and visually appealing user experience. <br /><br />From responsive layouts to interactive interfaces, we leverage the power of modern frontend technologies to bring your digital vision to life.":"A sahun gaba na kirkire-kirkire, mun ƙware wajen ƙira da haɓaka hanyoyin warware matsaloli ta amfani da sabbin fasahohi.  <br /><br />Daga shimfidu masu amsawa zuwa mu'amalar mu'amala, muna yin amfani da ƙarfin fasahar gaba ta zamani don kawo hangen nesa na dijital ku zuwa rayuwa.","We offer expert consultations in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Data Science, providing tailored insights and solutions to meet your specific needs. <br /><br />Our experienced team of professionals is dedicated to guiding you through the complexities of these advanced technologies, ensuring that you make informed decisions and harness the full potential of AI, ML, and Data Science for your projects and goals.":"Muna ba da shawarwarin ƙwararru a cikin Hannun Hannun Hannu, Koyan Injin, da Kimiyyar Bayanai, samar da ingantattun fahimta da mafita don biyan takamaiman bukatunku. <br /><br />Teamungiyarmu ta ƙwararrun ƙwararrun ƙwararrun ƙwararrun ƙwararrun masana ne don gudanar da ku ta hanyar rikice-rikicen waɗannan fasahohin ci gaba, don tabbatar da cewa kun yanke shawara mai cikakken damar Ai, ML, da ilimin kimiyyar bayanai don ayyukan ku da burinku.","Our Features":"Siffofinmu","Website Maintenance":"Kulawar Yanar Gizo","Web Design, Web Development, Mobile App Design and Mobile App Development":"Zane-zanen Yanar Gizo, Ci gaban Yanar Gizo, Zane-zanen App na Waya da Ci gaban App na Waya","AI, ML and Data Science Consultation":"AI, ML da Bayanan Kimiyyar Kimiyya","We ensure the websites of our clients' is well maintained as we stay in touch with them":"Mun tabbatar da cewa gidajen yanar gizon abokan cinikinmu suna da kyau yayin da muke hulɗa da su","We design and develop with cutting edge technologies":"Muna tsarawa da haɓakawa tare da fasahar yankan","We provide Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Data Science consultations":"Muna ba da Hankali na Artificial, Koyan Injin da tuntuɓar Kimiyyar Bayanai","Prior to embarking on the construction of a website for your business, gaining a comprehensive understanding of the associated costs is crucial. This proactive approach ensures that you allocate your budget effectively for the project.":"Kafin fara gina gidan yanar gizon kasuwancin ku, samun cikakkiyar fahimta game da farashin haɗin gwiwa yana da mahimmanci. ","Contrary to a common misconception among business owners that website development is a one-time endeavor, it's essential to recognize both fixed and recurring costs entailed in establishing and maintaining a business website. This awareness enables you to make informed decisions and facilitates a more sustainable and successful online presence for your business.":"Sabanin rashin fahimta na gama gari tsakanin masu kasuwanci cewa haɓaka gidan yanar gizon aiki ne na lokaci ɗaya, yana da mahimmanci a gane ƙayyadaddun farashi da maimaitawa duka waɗanda ke tattare da kafawa da kiyaye gidan yanar gizon kasuwanci.","Price Comparison Table":"Teburin kwatanta farashin","Pricing Built For Businesses Of All Sizes":"Farashi Gina Don Kasuwanci Na Duk Girma","Dollar rate":"Farashin dala","Basic Plan (Budget Applications)":"Babban Tsari (Aikace-aikacen Kasafin Kudi)","Pro Plan":"Shirin Pro","Enterprise Plan":"Shirin Kasuwanci","2-3 months":"2-3 watanni","3-4 months":"3-4 watanni","4-6 months":"4-6 watanni","Developers Fee (3 or 5 or 7)":"Kudin Masu Haɓakawa (3 ko 5 ko 7)","Domain Registration/Renewal/Maintenance":"Rijistar yanki/Sabuntawa/Mai kula","12/5 or 24/7 Support":"12/5 ko 24/7 Taimako","512MB to 5GB of storage":"512MB zuwa 5GB na ajiya","Up to 1TB of storage":"Har zuwa 1TB na ajiya","Starting at $580 = ₦870,000 with additional recurrent costs.":"Farawa daga $580 = ₦ 870,000 tare da ƙarin farashi na yau da kullun.","Starting at $1,526 = ₦2,289,000 with additional recurrent costs.":"Farawa daga $1,526 = ₦2,289,000 tare da ƙarin farashi na yau da kullun.","Starting at $2,772 = ₦4,158,000 with additional recurrent costs.":"Farawa daga $2,772 = ₦ 4,158,000 tare da ƙarin farashi na yau da kullun.","Try Enterprise Plan":"Gwada Shirin Kasuwanci","Company":"Kamfanin","Website":"Yanar Gizo","Domain":"Yankin","Navigation items (number of pages), wanted functionalities, do you have a website that you like and why? ","Websites you like":"Shafukan yanar gizon da kuke so","Budget (USD or ₦)":"Kasafin kudi (USD ko ₦)","Before building a website for your business, it is important to know the costs involved. ","Hosting fee is free":"Kudin baƙi kyauta ne","Would you love to create, manage, and modify content on your website without the need for our specialized technical knowledge":"Kuna son ƙirƙira, sarrafa, da gyara abun ciki akan gidan yanar gizon ku ba tare da buƙatar ƙwarewar fasaharmu ta musamman ba","Register a custom address like www.YourBusinessOrName.com to your website or online store":"Yi rijista adireshin al'ada kamar www.YourBusinessOrName.com zuwa gidan yanar gizonku ko kantin sayar da kan layi","Netlify build bots do it by parsing your HTML files directly at deploy time, so there’s no need for us to make an API call or include extra JavaScript on your site":"Netlify gina bots suna yin ta ta hanyar rarraba fayilolin HTML ɗinku kai tsaye a lokacin turawa, don haka babu buƙatar mu yi kiran API ko haɗa ƙarin JavaScript akan rukunin yanar gizon ku.","Friendly Forkhive Guides are standing by to answer your questions.
